title: Before Morning Practice......
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Hey~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Morning, Ayumu. It’s rare for you to get here last.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Good morning, Karin-san. I almost slept in today...... Ehehe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Were you up late last night?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I was listening to the songs that girl made and got really into it. Time flew by without me realizing it.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, I didn’t know that’d happen to you too, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I was surprised when I woke up too. I’m so glad I made it just in time~! I’m gonna get dressed and go to the lesson room right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Before you go, can I? Your hair is.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, there’s no time... I’ll tie it up properly before class.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>May I do it for you? I’ll make a bun for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Um, but the time......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t worry, it’ll be quick. Here, sit there and catch your breath while I do it for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
